The UFC is back in Florida this week, and a former champion headlines the card.

UFC on ESPN+ 19 takes place Saturday at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. The card streams on ESPN+.

(Click here to open a PDF of the staff picks grid in a separate window.)

In the main event, former women’s strawweight champ Joanna Jedrzejczyk (15-3 MMA, 9-3 UFC) takes on fellow contender Michelle Waterson (17-6 MMA, 5-2 UFC) in what could prove to be a title eliminator. The oddsmakers have made Jedrzejczyk a heavy favorite around -350, and our 13 MMA Junkie editors, writers, radio hosts and videographers are siding with her, as well, at a 10-3 clip.

In the co-main event, Kron Gracie (5-0 MMA, 1-0 UFC) takes on Cub Swanson (25-11 MMA, 10-7 UFC) in a featherweight bout. Gracie is about a -185 favorite, and like Jedrzejczyk, he’s a 10-3 pick from our staff members.

Also on the main card, Niko Price (13-3 MMA, 5-3 UFC) takes on James Vick (13-4 MMA, 9-4 UFC) in a welterweight bout. Price is a mild favorite at the sports books, but he’s a decent favorite with our pickers at 8-5

Mackenzie Dern (7-0 MMA, 2-0 UFC) is about a -150 favorite against Amanda Ribas (7-1 MMA, 1-0 UFC) in their women’s strawweight bout, but Dern has a big 9-4 lead in the picks.

Our closest fight, picks-wise, is at lightweight between Matt Frevola (7-1-1 MMA, 1-1-1 UFC) and Luis Pena (7-1 MMA, 3-1 UFC). Frevola is the underdog, but he’s got a 7-6 picks lead.

And to open the main card, Eryk Anders (12-4 MMA, 4-4 UFC) has a big 9-4 picks lead over Gerald Meerschaert (30-11 MMA, 5-3 UFC) in their light heavyweight bout.

In the MMA Junkie reader consensus picks, Jedrzejczyk (62%), Gracie (58 percent), Price (68 percent), Dern (70 percent), Pena (80 percent) and Anders (73 percent) are the choices.

Check out all the picks above.
description: Check out our staff members' picks for the UFC on ESPN+ 19 main card in Tampa, Fla.
